mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDiscountRate, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsThumbnailImage) values (#{goodsCode}, #{goodsName}, #{firstClassification}, #{secondClassification}, #{brand}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsStock}, #{goodsDiscountRate}, #{goodsDescription}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsThumbnailImage})
mapper.select: SELECT goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDiscountRate, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsThumbnailImage, goodsAddedTime FROM goods ORDER by goodsCode DESC

SELECT goodsCode, goodsName, firstClassification, secondClassification, brand, goodsPrice, goodsStock, goodsDiscountRate, goodsDescription, goodsImage, goodsThumbnailImage, goodsAddedTime FROM goods WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET goodsName = #{goodsName}, firstClassification = #{firstClassification}, secondClassification = #{secondClassification}, brand = #{brand}, goodsPrice = #{goodsPrice}, goodsStock = #{goodsStock}, goodsDiscountRate = #{goodsDiscountRate}, goodsDescription = #{goodsDescription}, goodsImage = #{goodsImage}, goodsThumbnailImage = #{goodsThumbnailImage} WHERE goodsCode = #{goodsCode}
mapper.select: SELECT g.orderId, g.goodsName, g.goodsCode, g.cartStock, g.goodsPrice, o.orderRecipient, o.phone, o.zipcode, o.address1, o.address2, g.orderStatus FROM ordered_goods g INNER JOIN `order` o ON g.orderId = o.orderId
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods WHERE firstClassification = #{firstClassification}
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM `order` WHERE `orderDate` BETWEEN '2020-12-01 00:00:01' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59'
